The state is preparing for an expansion of vaccine eligibility by April 5, when all Michiganders over the age of 16 will be qualified to receive shots.

articles.author: Jackson Cote | jcote@masslive.com
articles.title: Massachusetts to get 8,000 ‘unexpected’ Johnson & Johnson COVID vaccines this week, officials say - MassLive.com
articles.description: Of the 170,000 first doses the state is set to get this week, 8,000 will be Johnson & Johnson’s vaccine, marking a "modest increase," officials said.
articles.content: Massachusetts is set to receive more than 150,000 first doses of the coronavirus vaccine this week, several thousand of which will unexpectedly be from the multinational company Johnson & Johnson… [+2490 chars]
